Text: M Penner Closed January st and ndSo that our employees may spend a little extra time with their families after a hectic holiday season please note that M Penner will be CLOSED TUESDAY JANUARY and WEDNESDAY JANUARY We will also close at pm New Years Eve HAPPY NEW YEAR
